Entries.Sat: I had a lot of fun helping Demetrius out in the laboratory... hopefully I can do some fun experiments on my own, now.
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#Dad once told me that a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go, but I'm a too busy.

Entries.Tue: My mother was the town carpenter... now Magnus is filling in for her. That's so... weird, isn't it?

Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my dad was a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
My mother was a carpenter and my dad is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
My mother was a carpenter and my dad was a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.

Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at the clinic.#$b#I need to be there in case the medical equipment goes haywire.$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: I hope things go well for... oh! @, dear, I didn't see you there.#$b#I was just talking to myself.

Entries.marriageJob.000: I'm at work, honey! Don't let anyone see.

Entries.marriage_Mon.001: I'm making good progress on my next experiment.

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: ...These readings don't make sense. I swear, I'm picking up her voice...$s#$b#Huh? Oh, @! Sorry, I'm just... finding some odd irregularities in my signals.

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Dad tracked the weather patterns for the last twenty years.#$e#We're still processing the data, but the results have revealed some abnormal trends.
Entries.winter_5: Winter's a little depressing, since there's less opportunity for field research.#$b#I guess that just means I have to look harder!$h

Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I'm really starting to love this old house. It's so cozy at night.#$e#You've done a great job improving the place.$h

Entries.funReturn_Maru: Mom's doing just fine. Her routine is still the same, even with me and Dad gone. How was your day?
Entries.funLeave_Maru: I think I'll visit my mom today. I haven't seen her in a while.

Entries.funReturn_Maru: Dad's doing just fine. His routine is still the same, even with me and Mom gone. How was your day?
Entries.funLeave_Maru: I think I'll visit my dad today. I haven't seen him in a while.

Entries.funReturn_Maru: Mom's old lumberworks are doing just fine without her. I'm glad Magnus is doing a good job.#$b#How was your day?
Entries.funLeave_Maru: I think I'll stop by my old house today. I'm feeling... sedimental. *wink*$h

Entries.Maru_comet5: It makes me glad to live on this beautiful world with you.
Entries.Maru_comet3: Here for one fleeting moment, then just as suddenly gone...
